name: Family Ties (itch)
description:
Family Ties is Team Ninobi's entry for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.
Thank you for taking the time to check it out!

In Family Ties you control the three members of a family seeking passage through the ruins of a once glorious city upon the sea.

The family members all possess their own unique strengths, and to successfully make it through the city you must use them wisely.

Controls:

  • All characters:
    • Tab = Swap active character
    • Arrow Keys/WASD = Move current character
    • Mouse Cursor = Reposition camera
    • Spacebar = Jump
    • Escape = Bring up pause menu
  • Only as BLUE:
    • Press spacebar while in-air = Double jump
  • Only as YELLOW:
    • Hold spacebar while in-air = Glide
  • Only as GREEN:
    • Hold spacebar while in-air = Short glide

For more on the creators of this game, please visit:
Team Ninobi - itch.io

Additional credits and thanks go to:

  • Music track "Road" (www.gamesounds.xyz)
  • Sound effects from www.freesounds.org:
    • harpoyume
    • lebaston100
  • Skybox by AvionX (https://avainx.wordpress.com/)
